text: Roman Blagoy (born 25 October 1987) is a Ukrainian former professional ice hockey forward. Blagoy played in the Kontinental Hockey League for HC Donbass and Metallurg Novokuznetsk. He was also a member of the Ukrainian nation team. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Arlan Kokshetau players Category:HK Brest players Category:HC Donbass players Category:Dunaújvárosi Acélbikák players Category:Gornyak Rudny players Category:Kazakhmys Satpaev players Category:Kompanion Kiev players Category:Metallurg Novokuznetsk players Category:HK Mogilev players Category:Saryarka Karagandy players Category:Sokil Kyiv players Category:Ukrainian ice hockey forwards Category:Ukrainian expatriates in Russia Category:Yermak Angarsk players Category:Yertis Pavlodar players
title: Roman Blagoy
